name: Pony Jorgensen 27091 Medium Duty Woodworker's Vise, Orange, Grey, 9-Inch By 7-Inch
short_description: Country Of Origin : China
Package Weight : 5.96 Lbs
Designed To Mount To The Face Of Wood Work Benches
Vise Is For Medium Duty Home, Shop Or Professional Use
product_description: The Pony Woodworker'S Vise Is For Medium Duty Home, Shop Or Professional Use. It Is Designed To Mount To The Face Of Wood Work Benches. The Top Edges Of The Jaws Are Typically Brought Flush With The Bench Top. It Will Mount To The Face Of Any Wood Work Bench But Some Work Benches May Need To Be Modified By Mortising Out Part Of The Bench Face Or Adding Wood Shims To Allow Jaws To Be Flush With The Bench Top. The Jaws Have Drilled Holes For Attachment Of Wood Facings Which Allows You To Protect Your Work (Wood Faces Not Included). The Front Jaw Features A Solid Steel Dog In The Front Jaw Which, When Used In Conjunction With A Bench Stop, Allows Oversized Work To Be Held Securely On The Bench Top. The Vise Operates Smoothly With Acme Thread Main Screw And Twin Guide Bars Of Plated Steel. Features A 7 Inch Jaw Width And 9 Inch Maximum Opening Capacity. Castings Are Grey Iron With Orange Baked Enamel Finish. The Chicago Based Pony Tools Inc. (Formerly Known As Adjustable Clamp Co.) Which Was Established In 1903 Is The Manufacturer Of All Pony And Jorgensen Products. The Pony Woodworker'S Vises Are Imported From China.
product_details: Item dimensions L x W x H ‎16.25 x 8.25 x 6 inches

Warranty Description ‎All devices manufactured by PONY TOOLS INC. ( formerly known as ADJUSTABLE CLAMP COMPANY) are intended solely for use by a consumer as hand tools and are designed to accept such reasonable load as may be applied by hand. They are warranted against faulty workmanship or material for a period of one year from the date of purchase.

product_description: STANLEY is a leading global manufacturer of hand tools, power tools and related accessories, and a flagship brand of the wider Stanley Black & Decker Corporation. For over 170 years, STANLEY has been responsible for unlocking new levels of user performance through creating some of the most useful tools ever made including the Bailey Plane, the Surform shaper, the PowerLock tape rule, and most recently, the FatMax line of products. Today, the company continues to be an industry leader in hand tool innovation thanks to a continued focus on the excellence that is inherent in every product, employee and business.

name: Updated 2-In-1 Bench Vise or Table Vise 4.5 Inch, Clamp Vice for Workbench Constructed with Cast Steel, Heavy Duty Workbench Vise Swivel for Woodworking
short_description: Multi-Purpose Vise: The heavy duty bench vice could be screwed firmly to the workbench or table with screws, and it can also be conveniently clamped on the workbench. Constructed with high-strength forged steel 60,000PSI, this vice can withstand high clamping pressure without breaking.

Versatile Jaw: The 4.5 inch vise adopts a pipe and flat jaw combination so that you easily hold circular pieces, such as tubes and pipes. The specially hardened and engraved jaws provide excellent grip and ensure long-lasting performance.

Premium Material: The surface is sprayed to enhance corrosion-resistance and to make it more smooth to the touch. With up to 5500 lbs. of clamping force, it's perfect for all your clamping needs. Perfect for both industrial and DIY home use.

270° Rotation: Built with a 270 degree swivel base, this work bench vise is ideal for use with a variety of clamping angles for versatility. Smooth guide rail makes both the screw and handle use smooth and effortless.
Universal Specs: Portable workbench vise boasts a polished flat anvil. Maximum opening of jaw is up to 110mm, jaw width 115mm and 50mm throat depth.

name: MAXMAN Clamp Bench Vise with Post Universal, Woodworking Vise, 360° Heavy Duty Cast Steel, Table Clamp Vise with Swivel Base for Workbench DIY Projects, Handcraft Creations
short_description: High-Quality Castings: The bench vise is forged from an all-steel base material, with a chrome-plated spindle and nut fixed support. The jaw adopts quenching & reburning technology to enhance hardness and strength. It can basically meet the fixed usage requirements of most objects, resist deformation under extreme pressure, and ensure reliable use in workshops for decades

Complete installation kit: 1 fully lacquered orange bench clamp, 4 bowling sticks to hold posts, 4 special soft rubber protective covers for clamping posts, 2 non-slip rubber gaskets. There are 10 holes, which can be fixed according to your different needs for the product

360° spherical design: The head can be rotated 360°, oblique side can be tilted up to 45°, and the whole is smooth. Compared with the traditional table vise pivot, the rotation is more flexible and integrated, making it convenient for you to use fixed supports at multiple angles. This professional-level flexibility is superior to standard bench pliers and clips

Technical specifications: The maximum height of the table clamp can reach 12.5 inches, the maximum opening of the workbench vise mouth can reach 3.2 inches, and the width is approximately 3 inches. It is suitable for DIY, woodworking, metal parts processing, and industrial workshops

Prevent scratches: The fixed workbench is equipped with rubber pads to prevent the desktop from wearing due to force. The jaws are provided with non-slip rubber gaskets. The soft rubber gaskets can prevent products such as guns and pipes from sliding or scratching their surfaces when they are fixed

Safety usage reminder: It is not recommended to increase the leverage force of the woodworking vise, or to extend the distance between the two sides of the screw. Excessive pressure will easily cause instability of the jaws
